readable.title: 3471841031_a949645ba8
readable.content: A woman leaning over to help a child in a stroller with a man laying down on a park bench and another sitting on a bench . a woman ties her little girls shoes in front of a bench with a man sleeping on it People at park sitting on benches and a woman taking care of her child in the stroller . The woman helps her child as the men sit and lay on the bench . This family needs a rest after their long walk so they stop at the park to feed the pigeons .
